scripts.quarkus:dev:win32: mvn clean package quarkus:dev `-DskipTests `-DQUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) `-DKOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version)
scripts.quarkus:dev:darwin:linux: mvn clean package quarkus:dev -DskipTests -DQUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) -DKOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version)
scripts.install:mvnw:win32: yarn powershell mvn wrapper:wrapper `-DQUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) `-DKOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version)
scripts.build:dev:win32: yarn install:mvnw && yarn powershell mvn clean install `-DskipTests `-DQUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) `-DKOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version)
scripts.build:dev:darwin:linux: yarn install:mvnw && mvn clean install -DskipTests -DQUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) -DKOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version)
scripts.build:prod:win32: yarn install:mvnw && yarn powershell mvn clean install `-DskipTests=$(build-env global.build.test --not) `-DQUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) `-DKOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version)
scripts.build:prod:darwin:linux: yarn install:mvnw && mvn clean install -DskipTests=$(build-env global.build.test --not) -DQUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) -DKOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version)
